196: Most parts on the list have been collected.
清单上的零件已经基本收集完毕。
リストの部品は大体集め終わりました。
The group has finished collecting most of the parts on the list.
The parts on the list have largely been collected.
I have finished collecting most of the parts on the list.
Okay, check the load distribution and return immediately.
好，确认负重分配，立即返回。
よし、重量の分配を確認してすぐに帰るわよ。
좋아, 중량 배분을 확인하고 바로 돌아갈게.
Okay, confirm weight distribution and return immediately.
Okay, I'll check the weight distribution and be right back.
At least we did it... The mission is 50% complete now. Hope Hyperion is all good.
总算是有惊无险…这样至少任务已经完成了一半了，希望休伯利安号那边能平安无事。
ここまでずっと生きた心地がしなかったわね……でも、これで少なくとも任務の半分は完了ね。ハイペリオン号の方も無事でいてくれればいいんだけど。
여기까지 계속 살아있는 기분이 없었네…… 하지만, 이제 적어도 임무의 절반은 완료네. 히페리온호 쪽도 무사히 있어주면 좋겠는데.
At least we did it... The mission is 50% complete now. I hope the Hyperion is still alright.
It was a scare...so at least the mission is half done...hopefully the Huberian will be safe.
I haven't felt alive all the way here ......, but that's at least half of the mission done. I hope the Hyperion is safe and sound as well.
Here you are, these are your loads. It will be a lot more difficult to go back, don’t fall behind.
拿着，这些是你的负重，回去的路可比来时要艰难多了，不要掉队。
ほら、持って。これはあなたの分よ。帰り道は来たときよりも大変だから遅れないようにね。
자, 가져. 이건 네 몫이야. 돌아가는 길은 올 때보다 힘들 거니까 늦지 않게 해.
Here, take these, they're for <color=#cc66ffFF>you</color>. The way back is a lot tougher, so don't fall behind.
Take this, these are your load, the way back can be much tougher than when you came, don't fall behind.
Here, take it. This is for you. The way back is harder than the way you came, so don't be late.
Captain Himeko! Look at the sky! It’s that dragon!
姬子队长！看天上！是那条巨龙！
姫子隊長！上です！あのドラゴンです！
Captain Himeko! Look up in the sky! It's that giant dragon!
Captain Himeko! Look up in the sky! It's that giant dragon!
Captain Himeko! It's up there! It's that dragon!
Tsk! Dammit! How did it catch up so fast!
啧！见鬼！居然这么快就追上来了么！
もう！なんてこと！こんなに早く追ってくるなんて！
Sheesh! Damn! They're catching up so fast!
Oh, my God! Oh, my God! I can't believe they followed us so fast!
It’s gone... I think it didn’t see us.
飞走了…似乎没有发现我们。
飛んでった……私たちのことは見えていなかったのかしら。
Flew away...didn't seem to notice us.
I wonder if he didn't see us flying .......
That direction... No! It’s targeting Hyperion!
那个方向是…不对！它的目标是休伯利安号！
あの方角は……マズい！あいつの目標はハイペリオン号よ！
저 방향은…… 안 되겠어! 저 녀석의 목표는 히페리온호야!
That direction is...no! It's aiming at the USS Huberian!
That direction is ...... bad! His target is the Hyperion!
Captain! We had a report from the sentinel in front! Lots of Houkai creatures have appeared around the car park! We are surrounded!
队长！前方哨位报告！在停车场周围出现大量崩坏生物！我们被包围了！
隊長！前方の見張りから報告です！スクラップ工場の周囲に大量の崩壊生物が出現！包囲されました！
대장! 전방 감시초소에서 보고입니다! 스크랩 공장 주변에 대량의 붕괴 생물이 출현! 포위되었습니다!
Captain! Forward post report! A large number of collapsed creatures have appeared around the parking lot! We're surrounded!
Captain! Sir! The forward lookout reports! A large number of disintegrating organisms have appeared around the scrap yard! We're surrounded!
Seems the Herrscher wants to destroy us all... Everyone, arm yourselves! Prepare to break through!
看来律者是要把我们全部消灭…命令所有人全副武装！准备突围！
どうやら律者はここで私たちを消滅させるつもりのようね……全員完全武装！突破用意！
유라가 여기서 우리를 소멸시킬 작정인가 �... 전원 완전무장! 돌파 준비!
It looks like the Herrscher is going to wipe us all out...order everyone to arm themselves! Prepare to break out!
Looks like the scribes intend to annihilate us here. ...... All fully armed! Prepare to breach!
197: Everyone, keep up! Focus fire to create a breaking point!
所有人跟上！集中火力创造突破口！
全員続けっ！火力を集中して突破口を開くわよ！
전원 계속 전진! 화력 집중해서 돌파구를 열 거야!
Everybody follow! Concentrate your firepower to create a breach!
Everybody keep up! Concentrate your firepower and we'll make a breakthrough!
Captain! Many Houkai creatures have appeared on the left flank! We are under attack from both sides!
队长！左翼出现大量崩坏生物！我们被夹击了！
隊長！左翼から大量の崩壊生物が！このままでは挟み撃ちです！
대장! 좌익에서 대량의 붕괴 생물이! 이대로는 협공당할 겁니다!
Captain! Many Honkai beasts have appeared on the left flank! We are under attack from both sides!
Captain! A large number of collapsed creatures have appeared on the left flank! We're being pinned down!
Captain! Massive disintegrating organisms coming from the left flank! If we don't do something, we'll be pinched!
Dammit! Take cover! Establish firebase! We can’t let them come close!
可恶！寻找掩护！建立火力点！不能让它们压上来！
しまった！障壁となる壁を探して！迎撃ポイントを作るわ！あいつらを近づけたらダメよ！
젠장! 장벽이 될 벽을 찾아! 영격 포인트를 만들 거야! 저 녀석들을 가까이 오게 두면 안 돼!
Damn! Find cover! Establish a fire point! We can't let them get on top of us!
Sheesh! Look for a barrier wall! We'll make an intercept point! We can't let them get to us!
Captain! There are too many Houkai creatures! We can’t last long! If they surround us, we can’t get out!
队长！崩坏生物太多了！我们支撑不了多久！如果崩坏兽的包围网形成我们就出不去了！
隊長！崩壊生物が多すぎます！もう、持ちこたえられません！崩壊獣に包囲網を完成させられたら、ここから出られなくなります！
대장! 붕괴 생물이 너무 많아요! 더는 버틸 수 없어요! 붕괴수에게 포위망을 완성시키면, 여기서 나갈 수 없게 됩니다!
Captain! There's too many Honkai beasts! We can't hold them for long! If they surround us, we'll never make it out of here!
Captain! There are too many Avalanche creatures! We can't hold them for long! We can't get out if the Avalanche Beast's encircling net forms!
Captain! There are too many decaying organisms! We can't hold on any longer! If the Honkai Beasts complete their siege, we'll never get out of here!
There are still too many of us. It’s hard for all of us to break through. Someone must play decoy to create an opportunity for the main force...
我们的人数还是太多了，要全部突围很困难，必须有人来牵制它们为大部队创造机会……
私たちの人数が多すぎる。全員でこの囲みを突破するのは難しいわ。誰かがあいつらを牽制して、部隊にチャンスを作らないと……。
우리 인원이 너무 많아. 전원이서 이 포위망을 돌파하는 건 어려워. 누군가가 저 녀석들을 견제해서 부대에 찬스를 만들어야지…….
We still have too many people, to all break out very difficult, must be someone to hold them to create opportunities for the big troops ......
There are too many of us. It's going to be hard for all of us to break through this enclosure. Someone has to keep those guys in check and create opportunities for the troops. ......
Captain Himeko, leave it to us!
姬子队长，把牵制的任务交给我们吧！
姫子隊長、牽制の役目は私たちに任せてください！
히메코 대장, 견제의 임무는 우리에게 맡겨 주세요!
Captain Himeko, give us the task of holding back!
Captain Himeko, leave the checking role to us!
Take the explosives... Hope they can be of help.
这些炸药给你们…希望能派上用处。
この爆薬をあなたたちに渡すわ……うまく使ってね。
이 폭약을 너희들에게 넘겨줄게…… 잘 사용해.
These explosives are for you...hope they come in handy.
I'm going to give you guys these explosives and you can put them to good use at .......
はい、ありがとうございます。隊長。
The rest of you come with me!
I will also stay to defend.
彼女たちを見捨てられない。
198: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
Are you going to stay here and die!
你要留在这里送死么！
ここに残っていたら死ぬわよッ！
여기에 남아있으면 죽을 거야!
Are you going to stay here and die!
If you stay here, you will die!
msg
Follow my orders! This is the way Greymoths fight!
给我服从命令！这就是灰蛾部队的作战方式！
命令に従いなさい！これが灰蛾部隊の戦い方なのよ！
명령에 따르세요! 이것이 회아 부대의 싸움 방식이에요!
Obey my orders! That's how the Grey Moth troops fight!
Obey my orders! This is the way the Ash Moth Unit fights!
msg
We must live and go back! Or everyone will die! If you understand, get moving!
我们必须活着回去！不然所有人都得死！明白的话就给我动起来！
私たちは必ず生きて帰らなくちゃいけないの！さもないと全員死ぬのよ！分かったら動きなさい！
우리는 반드시 살아서 돌아가야 해요! 그렇지 않으면 모두 죽는 거예요! 알겠으면 움직이세요!
We have to get back alive! Or everyone will die! Move if you understand!
We have to make it back alive! Or we will all die! Now, move!
msg
Go!
走！
行くわよ！
갈 거예요!
Go!
Let's go!
199: We are almost at Hyperion! Everybody, prepare to help the ship!
马上就要到休伯利安了！大家打起精神！准备救援战舰！
もうすぐハイペリオンよ！みんな頑張って！着き次第、戦艦の救援行動に移るわよ！
곧 히페리온이에요! 모두 힘내요! 도착하는 대로 전함의 구원 작전으로 넘어갈 거예요!
It's almost time to get to Hublian! Brace yourselves, everyone! Prepare to rescue the battleship!
It's almost Hyperion! Good luck, everyone! As soon as we get there, we'll move in to rescue the battleships!
We have detected lots of Houkai creatures in front, but there is no battle. Hyperion is safe for now.
报告，前方发现大量崩坏生物，但是并没有战斗发生，休伯利安现在安全。
報告します。前方に大量の崩壊生物を発見。ですが、まだ戦闘にはなっていません。ハイペリオンは現在のところ安全です。
보고합니다. 전방에 대량의 붕괴 생물을 발견. 하지만, 아직 전투는 벌어지지 않았습니다. 히페리온은 현재로선 안전합니다.
Report, a large number of Avalanche creatures have been spotted ahead, but there is no battle taking place and Hublian is now safe.
Report. A large number of disintegrating organisms were found in the front. However, there has been no battle yet. Hyperion is safe for now.
They didn’t attack Hyperion? Are they waiting for us to get back and kill us all...
它们没有对休伯利安发动攻击？难道是想等我们到达后一网打尽么……
ハイペリオンに攻撃を加えていない？まさか、私たちが戻るのを待って一網打尽にするつもりなのかしら……？
히페리온에 공격을 가하지 않았어? 설마, 우리가 돌아오는 걸 기다려 일망타진하려는 건가......?
They didn't launch an attack on Hublian? Did they want to wait for us to arrive and kill them all ......
Have they not attacked Hyperion? Don't tell me they are waiting for us to return to round them up ......?
No matter what, we must return to the ship immediately. Everyone, prepare to attack. Watch your surroundings, Houkai creatures may attack any time.
不管怎么说，我们必须立刻返回战舰，全员准备突击，注意周围情况，崩坏生物可能会忽然发动进攻。
とにかく、今すぐ戦艦に戻らなくちゃ。全員突撃準備。周囲の状況に注意して。崩壊生物が突然攻撃を仕掛けてくるかもしれないわよ。
어쨌든, 지금 당장 전함으로 돌아가야 해요. 모두 돌격 준비. 주변 상황에 주의하세요. 붕괴 생물이 갑자기 공격을 해올지도 몰라요.
In any case, we must return to the warship immediately, all hands prepare to assault, pay attention to the surrounding situation, the collapse creatures may suddenly attack.
Anyway, we have to get back to the battleship now. All hands prepare to charge. Be aware of your surroundings. The disintegrating organisms may suddenly attack.
Woah!! We are gonna die! There’s no hope this time!
哇！！要死了！这次真的没希望了！
わあ！！死ぬ死ぬッ！今回こそ、本当にダメなやつ！
와아!! 죽는다 죽는다! 이번엔 정말로 안 되는 녀석!
Woah!! We're gonna die! There’s no hope this time!
Wow!!! I'm going to die! There's really no hope this time!
Aah! I'm dying, dying! This time, a real bad one!
Shut the @#$* up! Take the weapon!
少OO啰嗦！给我把武器拿上！
うっさい、黙れっ！さっさと武器持って来い！！
Stop nagging! Get me the weapon!
Shut up! Shut up! Get your weapons and get in here!
It’s all because of you! If Kyushou is here, we may still have some hope! What are we gonna do now!
都是因为你！要是把九霄说不定还有一丝希望！现在可怎么办！
全部あなたのせいよ！九霄が残っていればまだ一縷の望みがあったかもしれないのに！どうするのよ！
다 네 탓이야! 큐쇼가 남아있었더라면 아직 한 줄기 희망이 있었을 텐데! 어떻게 할 거야!
It's all your fault! If Kyuushou remained with us we'd still have a sliver of hope left! Now what are we giong to do!?
It's all because of you! If the Kyuushou may have a ray of hope! Now what to do!
It's all your fault! If only Kyuushou had remained, there might still be a ray of hope! What are you going to do!
It’s useless... Himeko and Kyushou are both not here... How can we defeat her... We’re done, we’re done, we’re really done...
没用了…姬子和九霄都不在…凭我们怎么可能战胜她的…完了完了这下真的完了……
無駄よ……姫子も九霄もいないんだもの……私たちだけじゃ勝てないわよ……終わったわ。今度こそ完全に終わりよ……。
소용없어……히메코도 큐쇼도 없는 걸……우리들만으로는 이길 수 없어……끝났어. 이번에는 완전히 끝이야…….
useless ... Jiuzi and Kyuushou are not in ... with how we can beat her ... finished finished this is really finished ......
It's no use.......Without Himeko and Kyuushou, we can't win on our own.......It's over. This time it's completely over. ......
I heard the sound of fighting! Did the Houkai creatures start to attack!?
有战斗的声音！难道是崩坏生物发动攻击了！？
戦う音！ちっ、ついに崩壊生物がここまで攻撃を仕掛けてきたか！
싸우는 소리! 쳇, 드디어 붕괴 생물이 여기까지 공격을 해온 건가!
There are sounds of battle! Could it be that the Avalanche creatures have attacked!
The sound of fighting! Damn, the disintegrating creatures have finally attacked this far!
要死要死要死要死要死……
死ぬんだ、死ぬんだ、死ぬんだ……。
죽는 거야, 죽는 거야, 죽는 거야…….
To die to die to die to die to die ......
Dying... Dying... Die... Why am I still alive?
要死…要死…要……怎么还没死？
死ぬんだ……死ぬんだ……死ぬ……あれ、死んでない？
To die ... to die ... to ...... how not yet dead?
I'm dying ...... I'm dying ...... I'm dying ...... Oh, no, you're not dead?
Did they give up because we don’t taste good!?
难道是因为我们太难吃了所以放弃了吧！
まさか、私たちが不味いことに気づいたのかしら！もしかして、諦めてくれた！？
설마, 우리가 위험한 걸 눈치챈 걸까! 포기해준 거야!?
Did we give up because it was too hard to eat!
No way, they must have figured out we're not good enough! Maybe they gave up on us!
You shut up! Houkai creatures will never let us go. They must be planning something so they surrounded us...
你闭嘴！崩坏生物不可能放过我们，它们把我们包围起来一定是在计划着什么……
静かに！崩壊生物が人間を放っておくはずないだろう。こうして包囲したからには、きっと何か裏があるはずだ……。
조용히! 붕괴 생물이 인간을 내버려둘 리 없잖아. 이렇게 포위했으니 분명 뭔가 속셈이 있을 거야…….
You shut up! There's no way the Avalanche creatures will leave us alone, they must be planning something by surrounding us ......
Quiet! No disintegrating creature would leave humans alone. There must be something behind the scenes because they have surrounded us in this way. ......
Captain Himeko and others are back!
报告！姬子队长她们回来了！
報告します！姫子隊長たちが戻ってきました！
Report! Captain Himeko and the girls are back!
Report! Captain Himeko and the others are back!
Was that sound from Himeko? There’s Houkai creatures everywhere! We must help them!
刚才的战斗声是姬子她们么？外面都是崩坏生物！我们得去接应她们！
さっきの戦闘の音は姫子たちだったのか？外は崩壊生物だらけだ！迎えに行こうっ！
아까 전투 소리는 히메코 일행이었어? 밖은 붕괴 생물 투성이야! 마중 나가자!
Is the sound of battle just now Himeko and the girls? There are all the Avalanche creatures out there! We have to go get them!
Was that the sound of battle just now, Himeko and the others? There are disintegrating creatures everywhere outside! Let's go get them!
Seems the Houkai creatures are not attacking them. The Greymoths have entered the ship.
崩坏生物似乎没有攻击她们，灰蛾部队已经进入舰内了。
いえ、崩壊生物は灰蛾部隊を攻撃していないようです。既に部隊員は艦内に入りました。
아니요, 붕괴 생물은 회아 부대를 공격하지 않은 것 같습니다. 이미 부대원들은 함내로 들어왔습니다.
The Avalanche creatures didn't seem to be attacking them, and the Grey Moth force had entered the ship.
No, the disintegrating organisms do not appear to have attacked the ash moth unit. The troopers have already entered the ship.
Himeko! How are you guys doing!
Himeko! How are you guys doing!
We’re fine... And we brought everything back safely.
没事…东西都安全带回来了。
大丈夫よ……部品は全て持って帰って来たわ。
It's okay. ...... I brought all the parts back.
How could you be fine! You had more people when you left!
怎么可能没事！去的时候可不止你们几个啊！
何が大丈夫なんだ！ここを出たとき、もっと人がいただろう！他の隊員はどうした！？
뭐가 괜찮다는 거야! 여기를 나설 때 더 많은 사람들이 있었잖아! 다른 부대원들은 어떻게 된 거야!?
How can it be fine! There were more than a few of you there!
What the hell is okay with you! There were probably more people there when we left here! What happened to the rest of the squad!
We were under attack from Houkai creatures. Others had died.
遇到了崩坏生物的袭击，其他的人都牺牲了。
崩壊生物の襲撃に遭って……ここにいない人たちはみんな犠牲になったわ。
붕괴 생물의 습격을 당해서…… 여기 없는 사람들은 모두 희생되었어.
The others were sacrificed when they were attacked by avalanche creatures.
We were attacked by a disintegrating organism and everyone who wasn't here ...... was sacrificed.
Was it from the Houkai creatures outside!?
是外面的崩坏生物干的么！？
今、外にいる崩壊生物にやられたのか！？
지금 밖에 있는 붕괴 생물에게 당한 거야!?
Is it the work of the collapsed creatures outside!
Now you've been hit by the disintegrating organisms out there!
No... We didn’t face too much resistance when we broke back in. Most of the loss was from the battles with their vanguard.
不…我们突破进来的时候没有收到太大的阻碍，是在与它们的先头部队的战斗中损失的。
いいえ……私たちが突破して入って来るとき、外のやつらはそれほど邪魔にならなかったわ。それよりも、あいつらの先遣部隊にやられたのよ。
아니요…… 우리가 돌파해 들어올 때 밖의 녀석들은 그다지 방해가 되지 않았어. 그보다는, 그들의 선견 부대에게 당한 거야.
No...we didn't receive much of an obstacle when we broke in, and were lost in the battle with their advance guard.
No. ...... When we broke through and came in, the guys outside weren't much of a hindrance. It was more their advance team that got us.
Bastards! No matter what, it’s those @#$* Houkai creatures! Let’s attack them before they attack us!
混蛋！不管怎么说都是那帮OO崩坏生物干的！趁它们还没攻击我们先下手进攻吧！
クソッ！忌々しい崩壊生物どもめ！攻撃してこない今のうちに、こっちから仕掛けてやろう！
썅! 이 빌어먹을 붕괴 생물들! 공격 안 해오는 지금이 기회다, 우리가 먼저 덤벼주자!
Bastard! No matter what, it was those OO Avalanche creatures that did it! Let's attack before they attack us!
Damn you! Damn disintegrating creatures! While they're not attacking, let's get them while we still can!
No, we cannot win with our current strength. I don’t know what they are waiting for, but the situation is good for us.
不行，以我们现在的战力主动出击是不可能有胜算的，虽然不知道它们在等什么，不过目前的状况对我们来说是好事。
ダメよ。今の私たちの戦力では、どう転んでも勝ち目がないわ。あいつらが何を待っているのか分からないけれど、今の状況は私たちにとって好都合よ。
안 돼. 지금 우리 전력으론 어찌 되든 이길 수 없어. 저것들이 뭘 기다리는진 몰라도, 지금 상황은 우리에겐 오히려 유리해.
No, there is no way we can win by taking the initiative with our current battle power. I don't know what they are waiting for, but the current situation is good for us.
No, we can't. With our current strength, we don't stand a chance no matter what. I don't know what they are waiting for, but the situation is favorable for us.
Yssring, fix the power furnace with the parts collected as soon as possible. We may have a chance to break through with Hyperion.

201: No one knows what will happen if we leave Nagazora. If we go back to ME Corp, it will be dangerous, but we still have some hope. We are also very familiar with the environment there so the battles will be less difficult.
离开长空市的话未来的路我们也无从知晓，回到ME社虽然危险但至少能够有一线希望，而且那里的地形与环境我们也最熟悉，战斗的难度会降低很多。
長空市を離れれば、その先の道は私たちにも全く分からない。けど、ME社に戻れば危険だけど、少なくとも一縷の望みがある。それにあそこの地形と環境は私たちもよく知っているから、戦闘の難度もだいぶ下がるわね。
창공시를 떠나면 그 앞의 길은 우리에게도 전혀 알 수 없어. 하지만 ME사로 돌아가면 위험하지만 적어도 한 줄기의 희망이 있어. 게다가 거기의 지형과 환경은 우리도 잘 알고 있으니까, 전투 난이도도 상당히 떨어질 거야.

We have no way of knowing what the future holds if we leave the city of Nagumo. Returning to ME Society is dangerous but at least there is a ray of hope, and the terrain and environment there are most familiar to us, making it much less difficult to fight.

If we leave Changkuu City, we have no idea what the road ahead will be for us either. But if we go back to the ME company, it will be dangerous, but at least there is a silver lining. Besides, we know the terrain and environment there very well, so the difficulty of the battle will be much lower.
Himeko, sometimes you can also use your brain to think~
哼，姬子你偶尔也会冷静思考问题了呢~

I prefer to hold my own destiny rather than waiting for miracles to happen.
与其期待偶然发生的奇迹，不如将命运握在自己的手中，
奇跡を期待するよりも、運命を己の手で掴み取るほうがいいでしょ。
기적을 기대하기보다 운명을 자신의 손으로 잡아채는 편이 나아.
Instead of expecting a miracle to happen by chance, we should take our fate into our own hands.
It's better to take fate into your own hands than to expect miracles.
Power output stable... Please, I hope there will be no problem...

現在、出力安定……お願いだからトラブルは起きないでよ……。

Currently, the output is stable ...... please don't give me any trouble .......

報告します！前方の崩壊生物に動きあり！戦艦に向かって押し寄せてきます！

ようやく攻撃を仕掛けてきたわね。やっぱり、この世界に奇跡なんて存在しないのよ……。
드디어 공격을 걸어왔네. 역시, 이 세상에 기적 같은 건 존재하지 않는 거야....

You're finally attacking me. After all, there are no miracles in this world. ......
All personnel, first level battle preparation! We are breaking through the Houkai creatures and returning to ME Corp!
